intro: Sylvie is a Full Stack Developer and UI/UX and Web Designer.  I have a passion for developing business-driving software solutions and enjoy working on frontend-focused projects. With a strong foundation in Python frameworks, JavaScript, and PHP, I strive to create high-quality and responsive web applications.
role: Web designer and junior full-stack developer
role_expl: a Full Stack Developer and UI/UX and Web Designer Crafting Web Alchemy with Cutting-Edge Tools and AI, Infused with VR and Blockchain Exploration
